file_content.text: A Sith approaches. I sense hostility. Your rescue has been sniffed out, Imperial.
Men, lock and load, we got company!
Stay your triggers, Imperial. I want to know what this one intends.
I intend to kill you all.
Not here to talk. [Attack]
My authority comes from the highest station. I am the Emperor's Wrath.
The Emperor himself sent me.
There is truth in your words. I can feel it.
But I sense hostility toward my mistress, Darth Ekkage.
Your mistress and her brother, Baras, openly defy the Emperor. They and everyone aligned with them must perish.
Ekkage is an enemy now.
Then I break my alliance with the offenders.
All you need to know is that our supreme master is displeased with your mistress.
You dare question the Emperor?
I will be on the right side of the Emperor.
My hostility is about to spread to you. Pledge yourself to me now, or die!
Bow before me!
The Emperor is my supreme master. I bend to you, my lord.
I don't have time to waste on talk.
Make it fast.
I'm here to ensure Darth Ekkage, and all associated with her, never leave Belsavis.
You and I are at odds, then. We have no intention of being locked up here again.
Why do you seek to stop my mistress's escape? We serve the same Empire.
I don't care to acquaint you with my motives.
You are tiresome.
Then you leave us no choice.
My fellows, this Sith has chosen today to die. It is our duty to oblige. Attack!
Because if released, you will all serve Darth Baras--and I hate Darth Baras.
She is the sister of my enemy.
Ah. I should have known this was personal. Sith-on-Sith violence is something my fellows and I are used to.
Let us see if your rage can overcome our experience and superior numbers.
My fellows, let us quell this poor Sith's pangs of vengeance. Attack!
I am an agent of the Hand. I am the Emperor's Wrath. You and Darth Ekkage serve a false Empire.
I serve the Emperor himself.
Ah. I have heard of the Hand. And my senses tell me you are true.
That is all I need to know.
My fellow infiltrators and I pledge our support to you and the Emperor. We will slaughter these commandos and then free our remaining brothers.
A wise decision. We welcome your allegiance.
I am pleased.
You do that.
Um, excuse me, sorry to interrupt. You--you're not really going to slaughter us, are you?
No, not really.
My fellows, we are not only free of these cells, we have been liberated from the rule of Darth Ekkage.
Kill all the commandos releasing our brothers in this cell block, and destroy any of our own who refuse to denounce the mistress.
We will not interfere when you face Darth Ekkage, my lord. You have my word.
You will be summoned. Be ready to serve the Emperor.
The Hand will contact you.
We will answer that call.
Betray me and you will die in agonizing pain.
You'd better be serious.
Your doubts will not be realized.
Goodbye.
May your strength surge when you face the mistress.
No. Better to be sure by killing you all.
I can't risk it. [Attack]
Band together, the Sith attacks!
